title: New: Lorde – Everybody Wants To Rule The World (Tears For Fears)
body:
Having well and truly cemented her place as one of the most talked about popstars in the world right now, teenage sensation **Lorde** has contributed to a track to one of this years biggest films; Hunger Games: Catching Fire.

Her haunting, yet epic cover of Tears of Fears 1985 single _Everybody Wants To Rule The World_, features alongside tracks from Coldplay, The Weeknd and The National. Check out her cover below, and the original underneath that.
